title: Getting Started
description: Start your cloud journey with CloudPortal CMP

title: Virtual Resources
description: CloudPortal Virtual resources are flexible, scalable, and accessible on-demand, typically hosted in Apache CloudStack environments.

title: Storage
description: CloudPortal Storage refers to the capacity to store and retain data, either temporarily or permanently.

title: Volume Snapshot
description: CloudPortal Volume Snapshot, also known as a point-in-time snapshot, is a backup copy of a storage volume taken at a specific moment in time.

title: Vm Snapshot
description: CloudPortal VM Snapshot is a backup of a virtual machine's current state, including its memory, settings, and disk contents.

title: Auto Scaling
description: CloudPortal's Autoscaling allows resources to automatically increase or decrease based on the demand.

title: Marketplace
description: CloudPortal Marketplace provides access to a range of pre-built software applications and services.

title: Networks
description: CloudPortal network enables data transfer and communication between computers, servers, and other devices.

title: Billing
description: CloudPortal is a cloud billing platform that enables to offer their customers the convenience of paying in their preferred currency
